% Auto-generated from JSON schema

\begin{entitytable}{Material}
\textbf{\field{materialCategory}} & enum(softwood, hardwood, mixed) & Enumerated value for materialcategory \\
\textbf{\field{materialName}} & string & Materialname field value \\
\textbf{\field{materialTypeId}} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the materialtype \\
\field{applicablePlantParts} & array<string> & Plant parts included in this material type \\
\field{applicableProcessingTypes} & array<string> & Array of applicableprocessingtypes values \\
\field{carbonStorageRate} & string & Carbonstoragerate field value \\
\field{defaultAssortmentTypes} & string & Defaultassortmenttypes field value \\
\field{density} & string & Density field value \\
\field{energyContent} & string & Energycontent field value \\
\field{excludedPlantParts} & array<string> & Plant parts excluded from this material type \\
\field{lastUpdated} & string (date-time) & Timestamp of the most recent data update \\
\field{plantPartProcessingSpecs} & object & Processing specifications by plant part \\
\field{standardMoistureContent} & string & Standardmoisturecontent field value \\
\field{standardQualityGrades} & string & Standardqualitygrades field value \\
\field{typicalSpecies} & array<string> & Array of typicalspecies values \\
\end{entitytable}
